title: "Travel distance" means the distance from the entrance/exit of the remotest Apartment/office/unit/Premises on a floor of a building to a place of safety be it vertical exit or a horizontally exit or an outside exit measured along the line of travel
clause_text: "Travel distance" means the distance from the entrance/exit of the remotest Apartment/office/unit/Premises on a floor of a building to a place of safety be it vertical exit or a horizontally exit or an outside exit measured along the line of travel.
